entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
